name: R-CALF UNITED STOCKGROWERS OF AMERICA
sampleDescriptions: Reform of cattle futures market to prevent excess speculation, improve transparency, and to restore its purpose of functioning as a risk management tool for producers.
Oppose new grazing restrictions on federally managed lands.
Oppose the TPP and support the renegotiation of NAFTA and other trade agreements.  This includes changing the standard for determining the origins of meat shipped in international commerce. Support a

Defend the First Amendment rights of cattle producers in a lawsuit against the beef checkoff program because producers are unconstitutionally compelled to fund the private speech of private entities a
